title: Cloud Architecture Center - Reliability and disaster recovery resources
abstract:
# Cloud Architecture Center - Reliability and disaster recovery resources
Last reviewed 2024-02-26 UTC
The Architecture Center provides content resources across a wide variety of reliability and disaster recovery subjects.
content:
## Get started
If you are new to Google Cloud or new to designing for reliability and disaster recovery on Google Cloud, begin with these resources:
- [Infrastructure reliability guide](/architecture/infra-reliability-guide) 
- [Disaster recovery planning guide](/architecture/dr-scenarios-planning-guide) ## Reliability and disaster recovery resources in the Architecture Center
You can filter the following list of reliability and disaster recovery resources by typing a product name or a phrase that's in the resource title or description.
